inclusion.criterion: treated for their disease for at least one year
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: compensated liver disease and/or stable neurological or psychiatric disease
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: biochemical testing must demonstrate normal or minimal elevation of serum ALT (<2 times the upper limit of normal)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Wilson disease diagnosis not well established
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: treated for less than one year
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: decompensated liver disease (ascites, jaundice, encephalopathy, bleeding due to portal hypertension)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: liver disease with elevations of ALT > 2 times upper limit of normal
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: female who is pregnant or intends to become pregnant
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has a history of tremors since a year ago, and was diagnosed with Wilson disease. He has been treated for his disease for at least one year and has compensated liver disease.
